treatment.description: Basal leaf blades filiform to linear, 1–10 × 0.05–0.4 cm. Cauline leaf blades perfoliate or slightly cleft, 1–5 cm diam. Flowers 10–12 mm diam., petals white or pink. 2n = 12.
treatment.habitat: foothill pine/blue oak woodlands of sierra nevada foothills and lower slopes
